sitemapList.title: Sitemaps
sitemapList.subtitle: Manage sitemaps to include them into index sitemap.xml

formSitemap.descriptionSitemapLocation: Sitemap location should be a relative sitemap URL unique in context of index sitemap, i.e.: 'categories/electronics.xml', 'products.xml', etc. Please avoid using 'sitemap.xml' in sitemap path.
formSitemap.sitemapIndexErrorMessage: Please avoid using "sitemap.xml" as sitemap location
formSitemap.sitemapSitemapLocationExistErrorMessage: This sitemap location is already used
formSitemap.descriptionSitemapItemsLocation: To generate a sitemap item URL can be used the next patterns: {slug} - will be replaced with SEO semantic URL part constructed depend on store SEO 'Links settings' rules. E.g /my-page/{slug}

sitemap.noSitemapsIemsMessage: There are no sitemap items yet

formCustomSitemapItem.descriptionUrlTemplate: The concrete relative URL  for custom items, i.e.: /about-us, /my-folder/my-page

sitemap-delete.title: Delete confirmation
sitemap-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete selected sitemaps?

sitemapItems-delete.title: Remove confirmation
sitemapItems-delete.message: Are you sure you want to remove selected items from sitemap?

confirmBaseUrl.title: Base URL
confirmBaseUrl.messageNoBaseUrl: Please enter base URL for sitemaps
confirmBaseUrl.messageConfirmBaseUrl: Please confirm base URL for sitemaps

discardChanges.title: Save changes
discardChanges.message: The sitemap has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

errorMessages.filenameNotUnique: Sitemap with this filename already exists

permissions.sitemaps:access: Access to open a sitemaps blade
permissions.sitemaps:read: Access to view a sitemap details

Sitemap.RecordsLimitPerFile.title: Records limit
Sitemap.RecordsLimitPerFile.description: Records limit per each sitemap file. Note that search engine crawlers are accept sitemap files which contain less than 50000 URL records and filesize is less than 10 MB

Sitemap.FilenameSeparator.title: Filename separator
Sitemap.FilenameSeparator.description: The separator for sitemap filename and its part in case of sitemap items count is greater than records limit per file

Sitemap.SearchBunchSize.title: Search bunch size
Sitemap.SearchBunchSize.description: The bunch size for search items (i.e. catalog search)

Sitemap.AcceptedFilenameExtensions.title: Accepted static content file extensions
Sitemap.AcceptedFilenameExtensions.description: This field contains the comma separated list of static content filename extensions which will be included to the sitemap. I.e.: .md,.html

Sitemap.ProductPageUpdateFrequency.title: Product page update frequency
Sitemap.ProductPageUpdateFrequency.description: How frequently the product page is likely to change. This value provides general information to search engines and may not correlate exactly to how often they crawl the page.

Sitemap.ProductPagePriority.title: Product page priority
Sitemap.ProductPagePriority.description: The priority of URL relative to other URLs on site. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0. This value does not affect how pages are compared to pages on other sites — it only lets the search engines know which pages deem most important for the crawlers.

Sitemap.CategoryPageUpdateFrequency.title: Category page update frequency
Sitemap.CategoryPageUpdateFrequency.description: How frequently the category page is likely to change. This value provides general information to search engines and may not correlate exactly to how often they crawl the page.

Sitemap.CategoryPagePriority.title: Category page priority
Sitemap.CategoryPagePriority.description: The priority of URL relative to other URLs on site. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0. This value does not affect how pages are compared to pages on other sites — it only lets the search engines know which pages deem most important for the crawlers.

VirtoCommerce.Sitemaps.description: Export/Import sitemaps with all sitemap items
